testsuite.name: com.eaglebank.repository.TransactionRepositoryTest

testcase.name: findAllByAccountNumber returns all transactions for account()
findByIdAndAccountNumber returns null for missing transaction()
creating a transaction for nonexistent account should fail()
can create and fetch transaction by id and account()
